text: José Paulo de Andrade (18 May 1942 - 17 July 2020) was a Brazilian journalist. He was born in São Paulo, Brazil. He was also a radio personality and television presenter. He presented the radio programs O Pulo do Gato and Jornal da Bandeirantes Gente from Rádio Bandeirantes São Paulo. Andrade died on 17 July 2020 in São Paulo from chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and COVID-19, aged 78.Jornalista José Paulo de Andrade morre aos 78 anos em SP após ser diagnosticado com COVID-19 ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from COPD Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in São Paulo Category:Brazilian journalists Category:Brazilian television presenters Category:Brazilian radio personalities Category:Writers from São Paulo
title: José Paulo de Andrade
